title._content: Image taken from page 11 of 'Prinsloo of Prinsloosdorp: a tale of Transvaal officialdom. Being incidents in the life of a Transvaal official, as told by his son-in-law, Sarel Erasmus, [By Douglas Blackburn]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Prinsloo of Prinsloosdorp: a tale of Transvaal officialdom. Being incidents in the life of a Transvaal official, as told by his son-in-law, Sarel Erasmus, [By Douglas Blackburn]" Author: ERASMUS, Sarel. Contributor: BLACKBURN, Douglas. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 012626.i.78." Page: 11 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1899 Publisher: Dunbar Bros. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001155858 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here.
